import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; const serverUrl = process.env.REACT_APP_SERVER_URL; function ForgotPassword({ theme }) { const [sent, setSent] = useState(false); const [email, setEmail] = useState(null); const [password, setPassword] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { if (sent) { axios.put(`${serverUrl}/reset-code`, { email }).then((reponse) => {}); } }, [sent]); return (
Forgot Passsword
 ); } export default ForgotPassword;
